common: to be young gifted and black and own it its more than a moment its like the sun rose to condone it before we was trapping we was trapped in sun and the whips kissing our black skin strange fruit hanging smell the jasmine rock to coltrane listen to jazz then back then we came with names like james fatima nina king dreamer redeemer of the people songs for the heaple original spiritual content you can smell it when its god-sent we keep it moving everyday we the target the young gifted and black on the market cause of that we pay with our lives or either catching charges but yo the goddess is in gods ears young gifted and black
